---
title: "Proms Data Dictionary"
---

```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

Data dictionary of Patient Reported Outcomes and Measures (PROMS) self-report survey data. 
The survey consists of multiple instruments. Some instruments also have multiple versions.
Subject to change.


```{r setup}
library(ironer)
#?dictionary_proms
```

```{r dictionary-reactable, echo=FALSE}
dictionary_proms %>% 
   reactable::reactable(
    filterable = TRUE,
    searchable = TRUE,
    resizable = TRUE,
    groupBy = "instrument",
    #paginateSubRows = FALSE,
    columns = list(
      instrument = reactable::colDef(minWidth = 200)
    )
  )
```
